resources.string: I AM a web developer extraordinaire
I AM in a well paying job
I AM committed to getting better
I AM have mastery over PHP, Wordpress, android programming and oracle
I AM committed to studying wealth creation
I AM committed to reading books everyday for at least an hour
I AM committed to God in prayer and study of his word
I AM a chapter from proverbs everyday for wisdom and i read five chapters from the bible everyday
I AM a prayer warrior who prays at least an hour everyday before sleep
